subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: purples
author: Ken Thomas
full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

the various explanations are not necessarily contradictory.  ruling out data on a preset notion based on PREVIOUS or ACCEPTED experience is just slamming the door in your own face; my wife and i cant accept that a one transistor device is calling my name; you have to bonk yourself in the head.
   
  the purples can be ANYTHING until we know different.  they dont even have to be material.
   
  

psi_research <vilhellm@...> wrote:
          http://www.ufobc.ca/Beyond/prayingmantis2.htm

I pasted the link this time, see above. 

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "psi_research" <vilhellm@...> wrote:
>
> Ken, the mantis head beings also appear purple. The color image 
halfway 
> down the page is similar to what I witnessed along with several 
other 
> people during a meditation excercise that was the lead in to a 
> dimensional portal building workshop.
> 
> Frank, when you mentioned the "purples" to me while I was in CO, I 
> immediately thought of my experience but your description was 
> different. My encounter was with a mantis head being.
> 
> Regards, Bill Murphy
> 
> p.s. we've been operating and recording some box sessions. During 
our 
> first sessions, the box seemed to be calling your name like it did 
when 
> we visited you. Through verbally stated intention, I communicated 
that 
> you have provided me with the box for continued research. Our last 
two 
> sessions began by my name being announced by the box. It's almost 
as if 
> the spirit technicians (or etheral beings) now recognize my energy 
> signature being imprinted in this particular box.
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ken Thomas <kennnthomas2000@> wrote:
> >
> > http://www.unknowncountry.com/news/?id=6132
> >
>
